column1: Why…
We can't get out of here.
Furthermore, we've been going in circles from the beginning.
I'm afraid we're caught in the enemy's trap.
We have got to find a way to get out of here.
That's right.
You've entered right into my trap.
Who are you!? What is this place!?
This is the mirror world.
My name is Kage Mimeima.
So are you the one who trapped us?
Indeed.
Then hurry up and get us out!
I can't.
The ceremony will take some time,
so here you'll rest while you wait.
She definitely won't let us out that easily.
I guess we have to find another way.
Since it looks like you may not know,
I am an expert when it comes to barriers!
Reimu sure is reliable.
Oh? Is that so?
Since you are an expert, then it should be easy to solve this issue, right?
Yup, that is correct!
The way of solving it is simple.
I'll defeat you!
How can this this considered as a way to solve it!
Hahahahaha!
What a conclusion reached by an expert.
You, the pair of an ignorant miko and a fragile inchling,
if you think you can do it, go ahead and try!
